description:
Moving with speed is the name of the game. This eco-conscious light trail shoe takes some inspiration from Merrell trail running shoes, for a fast and light ride that stands up to days in the backcountry. The thick midsole provides support on uneven terrain and when carrying moderate loads, and the lugged outsole keeps you upright as you tackle the trail.

  • Lightweight mesh upper with abrasion-resistant TPU overlays
  • Breathable recycled mesh lining keeps feet cool
  • Laces are 100% recycled
  • Bellows tongue prevents trail debris from getting in
  • FloatPro® EVA midsole provides plenty of cushion and a rock plate protects against penetration
  • Vibram® EcoDura rubber outsole contains 30% recycled content
  • 4mm lugs grip loose dirt and rock
name: Merrell Moab Speed Light Trail Shoes - Women's
